column4: Does anyone know why Starcraft/My Monitor is doing that and how to fix it?
I am running it with Wine.
does your monitor support 640x480? that's what starcraft is running at.
I can change the resolution to 640x480, but my monitor will say Input Singal out of range; Recommended Settings blah blah
It even does that when I try to play Counter Strike at 640x480.
I think you're monitor might not support it then.
You can still play starcraft in a window if you use a virtual desktop in wine.
I can change the resolution to that, but it looks like crap and has that annoying box still.
Sorry, I am not very good with computers.
do you mean you can run it at a higher resolution but with a large area of the screen simply black?
No, whenever I change my resolution to anything other than 1024x768 it "Auto Refreshes" and sometimes will say "Input Singal out of range; rec. settings 1024x768 60hz."

If I change my screen res to 640x480 that annoying box pops up and says that but will disappear and everything will be all pushed together, and even when I start SC is will keep the box there saying that until I exit.
in any case you should check the winehq site for starcraft: http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=149
